Name: Taivas
About the game: Taivas is a mysterious action roguelite, Dead Cells, rogue-lite, metroidvania inspired. set in a world of myth, and a time of magic. The destiny of a Canidae Kingdom rests on the shoulders of a young fox alike boy. His nameâ€¦ Joakim. Use spells and special powers and weapons to explore, destroy and fight your way to the surface, the UpWorld, and even beyond... Sky will not be the limit on this marvelous adventure... Story: You are Joakim, a young fox alike boy with fluffy tail and large, pointed ears, Knight of the Kingdom of Canidae. Kingdom has lived in peace for a long, long time, but now all kind of creatures are attacking against the Kingdom. Advisor of the Monarchy, magician Mikio sends you to a dangerous travel to the UpWorld. You start your journey from a middle of the Earth and start your journey to the surface, and beyond... Special playing style The style of play of the game is different from the mainstream: you progress from the bottom up. Features: Game currently offers one quite small but fun level! (cave) Save & Load function 2 Levels (Level 1 Cave: Part 1 and 2) 2 End Boss 1 Skill 1 Special Ablitiy 0 Special Powers This First version offers 50-100 minutes fun Unique main character The game character is unique and hand drawn. Game is in development, and there will be a lots of improvements to the current character, new enemies, new levels...
